name: Evoto AI
description: Evoto AI provides advanced AI-powered photo editing and retouching tools to streamline photography workflows.
longDescription: Evoto AI is a next-generation photo editing software designed to simplify and accelerate post-production for photographers and creatives. Leveraging artificial intelligence, it automates complex editing tasks such as skin retouching, background adjustments, and color grading while maintaining creative control. The platform supports both individual and batch editing, making it ideal for professional photographers handling large volumes of images. Its mission is to save time, reduce editing costs, and deliver professional-grade results with minimal effort. Evoto AI is available on Windows, macOS, and iPadOS, with features like tethered shooting and customizable presets enhancing workflow efficiency. The software continuously evolves with frequent updates based on user feedback.
features: AI-powered skin retouching automatically removes blemishes and smooths skin while preserving natural texture for realistic results.
Batch editing enables synchronized edits across multiple photos, ensuring consistent tones and styles in less time.
Background removal and replacement tools allow users to clean up or swap backgrounds effortlessly for enhanced compositions.
Tethered shooting connects cameras to Evoto for real-time editing, streamlining the photography process.
Customizable presets let users save and apply lighting setups or styles with one click for efficient workflows.
Glare removal eliminates eyeglass glare and restores details, improving portrait clarity with minimal effort.
Color adjustment tools enhance tones and hues for skin, clothing, or overall image aesthetics in just a few clicks.
Body reshaping tools offer precise control to adjust facial or body features naturally, per client requests.
Flyaway hair correction smooths and polishes hairlines with a single click, reducing manual editing time.
Digital makeup application adds virtual enhancements like lipstick or eyeshadow for customized portrait styling.

faqs.question: What is Evoto AI used for?
faqs.answer: Evoto AI is a photo editing software that uses AI to automate retouching, color grading, and background adjustments for professional and amateur photographers.

faqs.question: Does Evoto AI offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, Evoto AI provides a free trial, allowing users to test its features before committing to a paid plan.

faqs.question: Can Evoto AI handle batch editing?
faqs.answer: Yes, Evoto AI supports batch editing, enabling users to apply consistent edits to multiple photos simultaneously, saving significant time.

faqs.question: What are the subscription plans for Evoto AI?
faqs.answer: Evoto offers yearly plans starting at $89 for 800 credits, with higher tiers up to $579 for 9000 credits, charged only upon exporting images.

faqs.question: Does Evoto AI work on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Evoto AI is available on iPadOS, offering a full-suite editing experience, though some features like heal/clone brushes are limited compared to the desktop version.

faqs.question: Can I preserve unique facial features like freckles?
faqs.answer: Yes, Evoto AI provides sliders to adjust retouching intensity, allowing users to preserve features like freckles or beauty marks.

faqs.question: How does tethered shooting work with Evoto AI?
faqs.answer: Tethered shooting connects your camera to Evoto AI for real-time editing, enabling immediate adjustments as photos are taken.

faqs.question: Is customer support responsive for Evoto AI users?
faqs.answer: Customer support experiences vary; some users report excellent responsiveness, while others note slower response times for unresolved issues.
